_sText:
Course map originally named mg_gore_course_b1, created by ScHoOuFi and La Boule (original). I just took the map and fixed all of the leaks and optimized it a bit.

The sole purpose of this 'fix' was to improve performance on low-end PCs. So, for those still using toasters to play CS:S (including myself), this is for you. (~30 FPS on high settings looking down the hallway from spawn in original; 90-100 FPS in optimized version)

Changes:
- Optimization and leak fixes; previously, the entire map was rendered at once. Areaportals have been placed at every door
- Ice skate ramp is now a simple brush rather than a displacement, should no longer stop you
- Spawn timer changed from 10s to 30s; screen shake drastically reduced to avoid annoyance
- Secret trails adjusted a bit
- Added more player spawns.
- The floating sofa in level 3 has a static orientation.
- maybe some more I forgot about

I do not take any credit for creating this map; all credit belongs to the other authors listed under "Original Authors" above.
